price: ߡߍ߲ߘߌߦߊ߫ ( ߛߏ ) ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲ߞߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߕߍ߰ߟߊ ߘߐ߫ ߘߋ߬
arabic: إِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمۡ جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: inna lil'muttaqīna ʿinda rabbihim jannāti al-naʿīmi
